When editing sheets, try pressing F2 twice - on many machines you'll be able to see all the text in the cell and be able to edit it more easily.
You can have multiple conditions, just make sure that they have different names
Try to avoid using spaces in column headers when possible, and use _ instead

When putting inputs into the graphic trialtype editor, sometimes blank values not only are valid, but actually preferable. For example, it may be better to not set a width for a text element, if you want the text element to be as wide as the text. If you set a width, the text will wrap around the set width, which may or may not be what you want.
